task.title: Connect to a wireless headset
task.shortdesc: With a wireless headset (available separately), you can speak on the phone hands free â€“ you can continue what you're doing, such as working at your computer, during a call.

step.cmd: On the start screen, swipe left, and tap Settings > Bluetooth.
Make sure the headset is on.
To pair your phone and the headset, tap the headset in the list.
